title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-124)
description: On March 10, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following product:
products: Stable channel Chrome for desktop   versions prior to 134.0.6998.88/89 (Windows and Mac) and 134.0.6998.88 (Linux)
Extended stable channel   versions prior to 134.0.6998.89 (Windows and Mac)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
